## ModNode class

Modulo operation

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class ModNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns a - b \* floor(a / b), the remainder of a divided by b. Both inputs must be the same type (float, vec2, vec3, or vec4). Component-wise for vectors.
